title: Create a Stacking Plan for an Office Building
description: A leasing agent needs to create a visual stacking plan for an office building to show current tenants and available spaces.

tasks.description: Gather data for all tenants in the building, including their suite number, square footage, and lease expiration date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a complete and accurate list of all tenant data.

tasks.description: Use a software tool to create a color-coded, floor-by-floor visual representation of the building's occupancy.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear and easy-to-read stacking plan is generated.

tasks.description: Use the stacking plan in marketing materials to show prospective tenants which spaces are available.
tasks.expected_outcome: The stacking plan is incorporated into the property's leasing brochure.
